author: alexssd7fp
content: Is this true that Merge will boost the Ethereum TPS? For me it sounds like a lie, but I‚Äôve seen this in numerous articles.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: slightly, it changes blocktime from 13 to 12s

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: So in general no, and no one should say so

author: alexssd7fp
content: Ok, so looks like this is the same situation we had with EIP-1559 when people thought that it would decrease the gas price.

author: alexssd7fp
content: Yeah, but this is a side effect of ditching uncles.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
<@!892053833121923094> notified me about an issue in my new implementation and I had to implement the following:
On `newPayload` the header is written into a cache (if it is structurally valid)
On `forkChoiceUpdated` we check the cache if we have the header and start the sync with it (if not executed beforehand)
This is done, because we need to have a complete header for the sync (not only the hash)
(Not really important, just an fyi for other EL devs implementing the new spec)

content:
